distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for libexif fixes the following security issue:

- CVE-2017-7544: Fixed out-of-bounds heap read vulnerability in
  exif_data_save_data_entry function in libexif/exif-data.c caused by improper
  length computation of the allocated data of an ExifMnote entry which can cause
  denial-of-service or possibly information disclosure (bsc#1059893)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: libexif through 0.6.21 is vulnerable to out-of-bounds heap read vulnerability in exif_data_save_data_entry function in libexif/exif-data.c caused by improper length computation of the allocated data of an ExifMnote entry which can cause denial-of-service or possibly information disclosure.
notes.title: CVE description
